GSD.description:
ext4: fix warning in ext4_handle_inode_extension

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit e383c2aa5f02ab571530dc5c5696479672478c25. For more details please see the references link.
